|---------------------|
|      Def Table      |
|---------------------|
| t1 |    t1 = 10     |
| t2 |   t2 = 10000   |
| t3 | t3 = add t1 t2 |
| t4 | t4 = add t2 t3 |
| t5 | t5 = add t2 t4 |
|---------------------|
|---------------------|
|      Use Table      |
|---------------------|
| t1 | t3 = add t1 t2 |
|---------------------|
|    | t3 = add t1 t2 |
| t2 | t4 = add t2 t3 |
|    | t5 = add t2 t4 |
|---------------------|
| t3 | t4 = add t2 t3 |
|---------------------|
| t4 | t5 = add t2 t4 |
|---------------------|
